extension.name: quick lookup for the autocomplete in the navigation
extension.description:
This extension improves the default search in several ways: - more efficient and faster requests - search in the start of the names not in the middle (first or last). - adjust the queries based on the number of results. The aim is to provide the most relevant results at the top, all the time - you can enter the contact id and it will go directly to the contact page
Just try it, you will like it;)
Current limitations: - the result only includes the name and email. The address and phones are skipped for performance reasons. Shouldn't be too complicated to add them - the query always searches all the contacts and ignores ACL.
